Text:
Disappointing quality on this one. Will surely be remastered for the American release.

Also it'd be nice to have English forced subs too, as most English speakers don't want English subtitles for the English-speaking parts.

Thanks aoloffline for another great film, one of my wife's favourites.

Disagree with you jonny about forced subs. A separate srt for non-English speaking parts is far better.
No. Forced subs are more useful than complete subs. Subs should always be separate, and in MKVs they nearly always are.
Oh, it seems you don't understand what "forced" subs are.
Unnecessary snide comment jonny. I wasn't attacking you.
Nothing snide about it. A mere observation.
Your observation is incorrect, and my point still stands: separate passive text files are a better idea, as they can be switched on or off at will. If people wish to force them they can always remux.

thanks for this great movie!!

I cant find it any problem on this movie...

Excellent!
